analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/20/0xa8912b55ba860e15844a54e68fe3ea3d9e5cfa44.sol:
	Contract BTHBCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/20/0xa8912b55ba860e15844a54e68fe3ea3d9e5cfa44.sol#170-172)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/20/0xa8912b55ba860e15844a54e68fe3ea3d9e5cfa44.sol:
